name: Learning Loop Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of e-learning platform designed for universal lifelong learning. The company's platform offers a way of learning with people from different places and backgrounds with unique perspectives to learn from, and flexibility, enabling customers to experience curiosity-based learning without disrupting their lives.
